data.text:
News Words - Serbia

Learn to correctly pronounce difficult world places and names in the news. Use phonetic spelling to pronounce news words from Serbia. American English Pronunciation

Learn how to pronounce the 44 sounds of English. These lessons are arranged in two sections, vowels sounds and consonant sounds. Each lesson has a video and audio practice for each sound.
